import React from 'react'; import { portfolioData } from '../data/portfolioData'; import { FaLinkedin, FaGithub, FaEnvelope, FaHeart, FaArrowUp, FaHome, FaUser, FaCode, FaProjectDiagram, FaPhone, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaAward, FaGraduationCap, FaFileAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { SiReact, SiTailwindcss, SiNodedotjs } from 'react-icons/si'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); }; const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { document.getElementById(sectionId)?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); }; // All pages/sections from your portfolio const pageLinks = [ { name: 'Home', icon: FaHome, section: 'home' }, { name: 'About', icon: FaUser, section: 'about' }, { name: 'Education', icon: FaGraduationCap, section: 'education' }, { name: 'Skills', icon: FaCode, section: 'skills' }, { name: 'Projects', icon: FaProjectDiagram, section: 'projects' }, { name: 'Certificates', icon: FaAward, section: 'certificates' }, { name: 'Contact', icon: FaPhone, section: 'contact' } ]; return (
